name: Robot Issues
description:
Robot Issues
 This game was created for the Wowie Jam 4.0 and the theme was :"Collaborate With AI".

In this game, you are stuck in space ship with a little robot and you will need to face some puzzle that need collaboration between you and the robot.

You will need to trust your new friend because it is the only way for both of you to escape.

Team :
  • Eleanor MJ - 2D artist - @eleanor_mj_art
  • Dewey - Developper
Credits :

Music : A Long Way - Andrey Sitkov (licensed)
